testcase.name: Metrics Route Additional Tests > Configuration > should use Node.js runtime
Metrics Route Additional Tests > GET Endpoint > should validate metric types
Metrics Route Additional Tests > GET Endpoint > should handle multiple metrics
Learning Metrics Route Handler > Configuration > should use Node.js runtime
Learning Metrics Route Handler > GET /api/nous/learn/metrics > should fetch metrics with default parameters
Feedback Patterns Route Handler > GET /api/nous/learn/feedback/patterns > should fetch patterns with default parameters
Feedback Patterns Route Handler > GET /api/nous/learn/feedback/patterns > should handle database errors gracefully
Feedback Patterns Route Handler > GET /api/nous/learn/feedback/patterns > should handle custom timeframe and limit
Feedback Patterns Route Handler > GET /api/nous/learn/feedback/patterns > should handle invalid timeframe parameter
Feedback Patterns Route Handler > GET /api/nous/learn/feedback/patterns > should handle invalid limit parameter
Feedback Patterns Route Handler > GET /api/nous/learn/feedback/patterns > should handle limit out of range
Feedback Patterns Route Handler > GET /api/nous/learn/feedback/patterns > should calculate confidence and metrics correctly
Feedback Patterns Route Handler > GET /api/nous/learn/feedback/patterns > should handle empty results
